TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RequestValidator extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義自訂要求驗證的基底方法。

span.span: Defines base methods for custom request validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，ASP.NET 不會驗證要求之前從要求的程式碼明確要求的值。By default, ASP.NET does not validate requests until code explicitly requests a value from the request. 例如，ASP.NET 不會驗證查詢字串值直到程式碼存取集合。For example, ASP.NET does not validate query-string values until code accesses the collection. 根據預設，ASP.NET 也不會驗證某些類型的要求資料，例如表單值、 cookie、 已使用 HTTP 和的值已上傳的檔案名稱屬性。By default, ASP.NET also does not validate some types of request data, such as form values, cookies, the names of files that have been uploaded using HTTP, and the value of the property. 類別是基底類別，可實作以提供自訂要求驗證。The class is a base class that you can implement in order to provide custom request validation. 您可以實作這個類別，來判斷當驗證發生時以及要求資料上執行驗證的型別。By implementing this class, you can determine when validation occurs and what type of request data to perform validation on. 根據預設，ASP.NET 會提供跨網站指令碼 (XSS) 檢查。By default, ASP.NET provides cross-site scripting (XSS) checks. 不過，您也可以補充或取代所建立的自訂實作的 XSS 提供在 ASP.NET 要求驗證邏輯。However, you can supplement or replace the request validation logic that is provided in ASP.NET by creating a custom implementation of the XSS. 例如，您可以撰寫自訂要求驗證的實作，會掃描有 SQL 資料隱碼攻擊，除了檢查 XSS 攻擊。For example, you can write a custom request validation implementation that scans for SQL injection attacks in addition to checking for XSS attacks. 若要建立自訂要求驗證，您可以撰寫自訂的類別衍生自基底類別。To create custom request validation, you write a custom class that derives from the base class. 接著，您會設定 ASP.NET 應用程式層級的 Web.config 檔案中使用自訂要求驗證程式。You then configure ASP.NET to use the custom request validator in the application-level Web.config file. 在 App_Code 資料夾中，[Bin] 資料夾中的已編譯的類別庫中，或在 GAC 中編譯的類別庫中，您可以將自訂類別。You can put the custom class in the App_Code folder, in a compiled class library in the Bin folder, or in a compiled class library in the GAC. > [!NOTE] > 只能有一個自訂要求驗證類型可以設定應用程式。Only one custom request validation type can be configured for an application. 您不可以設定個別的虛擬路徑或頁面的不同要求驗證類型。It is not possible to configure a different request validation type for individual virtual paths or pages. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立自訂要求驗證，允許只將特定字串做為查詢字串值。The following example shows how to create a custom request validator that allows only a specific string to be used for query-string values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Util.RequestValidator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.util.requestvalidator/cs/requestvalidator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Util.RequestValidator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.util.requestvalidator/vb/requestvalidator.vb#1)] 下列範例示範如何設定 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中使用自訂驗證程式。The following example shows how to configure ASP.NET to use the custom validator in the Web.config file for an application. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別具有預設建構函式。The class has a default constructor. 初始化類別的新執行個體時，內部的方法會擷取自訂的驗證詳細資料，從應用程式的組態資訊。When a new instance of the class is initialized, an internal method retrieves custom validation details from the application's configuration information. 設定詳細資料包含在一節。The configuration details are contained in the section. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [httpRuntime 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)而屬性。For more information, see [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) and the attribute. 在初始化期間，單一執行個體類別建立，且執行個體的參考會保留在屬性。During initialization, a single instance of the class is created, and a reference to the instance is maintained in the property. ASP.NET 不會建立新的要求驗證程式執行個體，每個要求。ASP.NET does not create a new request validator instance per request. 因此，自訂實作的類別必須是安全執行緒。Therefore, custom implementations of the class must be thread-safe.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Web.Util.RequestValidator Current { get; set; }
Public Shared Property Current As RequestValidator
public: static property System::Web::Util::RequestValidator ^ Current { System::Web::Util::RequestValidator ^ get(); void set(System::Web::Util::RequestValidator ^ value); };
member this.Current : System.Web.Util.RequestValidator with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定將在應用程式中使用之目前 執行個體的參考。

span.span: Gets or sets a reference to the current instance that will be used in an application.
An instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會維護的單一允許的執行個體的參考類別。The property maintains a reference to the single allowed instance of the class. 如果沒有執行個體存在，則會建立一個新。If no instance exists, a new one is created. 如果執行個體已經存在，則會傳回目前的執行個體。If an instance already exists, the current instance is returned. 在初始化期間，單一執行個體類別建立，而執行個體的參考可在屬性。During initialization, a single instance of the class is created, and a reference to the instance is made available in the property. ASP.NET 不會建立新的要求驗證程式執行個體，每個要求。ASP.NET does not create a new request validator instance per request. 因此，自訂實作的類別必須是安全執行緒。Therefore, custom implementations of the class must be thread-safe. > [!NOTE] > 屬性不是安全執行緒屬性設定為目前的參考時類別。The property is not thread-safe while the property is setting a reference to the current class.

span.span: The property is .

span.span: if the string to validate does not contain unencoded characters that could be used in a malicious scripting attack; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會提供受保護的公用存取方法。The method provides public access to the protected method. 這可讓您建立的自訂包裝函式類別類別並呼叫方法，而不需要繼承自類別。This lets you create a custom wrapper class for the class and call the method without having to inherit from the class. 如需要求驗證資訊，請參閱。For information about request validation, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您實作這個方法，以執行自訂驗證的要求資料。You implement this method to perform custom validation of request data. 基底行為方法就像 ASP.NET 在內部實作的危險的字串，在跨網站指令碼驗證檢查的行為。The base behavior of the method is like the behavior that ASP.NET implements internally to check for dangerous strings in cross-site scripting validation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [How To： 在 ASP.NET 中防止跨網站指令](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=178708)。For more information, see [How To: Prevent Cross-Site Scripting in ASP.NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=178708). 如果自訂驗證邏輯會偵測到錯誤，這個方法會傳回`false`，並提供值以`validationFailureIndex`表示造成錯誤之文字的起點。If custom validation logic detects an error, this method should return `false` and provide a value in `validationFailureIndex` to indicate the starting point of the text that caused the error. 中的值`validationFailureIndex`必須是 0 或正整數。The value in `validationFailureIndex` must be 0 or a positive integer. 在要求驗證檢查邏輯程序進行，如下所示：The logic in a request validation check proceeds as follows: - 類別的 null 字元移除上執行檢查內送資料。The class performs a null-character removal check on the incoming data. - 類別會呼叫其中一個方法 （基底方法的預設實作），或是呼叫方法的衍生的版本。The class calls either the method (the default implementation of the base method) or calls a derived version of the method. - 如果方法會傳回`false`若要指出驗證失敗，ASP.NET 建構錯誤字串 （如有必要） 並擲回例外狀況。If method returns `false` to indicate a validation failure, ASP.NET constructs an error string (if necessary) and throws an exception.
